page.title: 06FARMING: LOVERSTONE FARM
page.content: Loverstone was in the original {Domesday Book.}This arable farm is now owned by Mrs.Henton. Since the death of Mr.Henton,{Henton's Building {Firm,}based at the farm, has been run down. Most of the machinery and materials was sold off at an auction recently leaving just a couple of benches, a circular saw, planer / thicknesser and a pillar drill. These are to remain as a service to some of the local craftsmen who have used the workshop as past employees and who now make windows and similar items for home improvements. The big barn / workshop has been full of hand and machine tools which have been used for generations. The Blacksmith's Forge now stands idle and outside in the yard the old pond has been filled in.
